scripts.reinstall-in-dummy-project: cd ./dummy-project && npm install && cd .. && rm -rf ./dummy-project/node_modules/jasmine-testreporter && rsync -av --progress . ./dummy-project/node_modules/jasmine-testreporter --exclude dummy-project
scripts.run-dummy-project-tests: npm run reinstall-in-dummy-project && cd ./dummy-project && npm run protractor-test
